marytts.htsengine
Class HMMData

java.lang.Object
  marytts.htsengine.HMMData

public class HMMData
extends java.lang.Object

Configuration files and global variables for HTS engine. Java port and extension of HTS engine version 2.0 Extension: mixed excitation

Author:
Marcela Charfuelan

readMixedExcitationFiltersFile

public void readMixedExcitationFiltersFile()
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
